item.description:
1. Secretaries of state urge Musk to fix AI chatbot spreading false election info  The Washington Post
  2. Elon Musk's X AI shared false election information after Biden dropped out, officials say  CNBC
  3. Secretaries of state call on Musk to fix chatbot over election misinformation  The Guardian
  4. Secretary of State Steve Simon urges Elon Musk to address misinformation on X platform  MinnPost
  5. WA Sec. of State signs letter asking Elon Musk to crack down on election misinformation  KING5.com
